<KamilChNethermind> @shekhirin 

Seeing this errors on Reth when running some new scenarios from EEST - and it stopped processing blocks afterwards

author: bridge-bot
content: <KamilChNethermind> Or at least it feels like it stopped processing - but maybe I just get less logs for some reason right after that and I don't see Mgas/s data

author: bridge-bot
content: <mediocregopher> In a recent commit we modified reth to not use parallel state root on low-core machines, that WARN is a side-effect of that, could probably be presented in a clearer way. Is the machine 4 cores or less?
